title: Fully Expandable and Customizable Create Gantry Crop Farm Tutorial | Minecraft Create Mod 1.20

tasks.task: Assembling a Create Crop Farm using the Gantry Carriage System

...Completed the fully automatic, expandable Create Crop Farm using the Gantry Carriage System. Answer: To construct the farm, assemble the Gantry Shaft, attach the Gantry Carriage and chassis, position the harvesters, set up redstone contacts for rotation control, plant crops away from the machine's moving parts, configure the toggle latch and gear shift, and establish a chute system for crop output. The process ensures automated operation with minimal manual intervention. [[.SafeBoat]] [[Minecraft Command Blocks]]
